title: Power generation from non-conventional sources of energy
clause_text: Power generation from non-conventional sources of energy. Area covered under solar panels shall not be counted in FSI. Religious buildings subject to conditions as may be prescribed by Authority.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Power generation from non-conventional sources of energy. Area covered under solar panels shall not be counted in FSI.
